com.guardtime.container.packaging

Class SignatureContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.container.packaging.SignatureContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedSignatureContent, VerifiedSignatureContent

    public class SignatureContent
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Structure that groups together all container internal structure elements(manifests), documents, annotations and signature that are directly connected to the signature.

      • getDocuments

        public Map<String,ContainerDocument> getDocuments()
        Provides access to all ContainerDocument contained by the structure.
        Returns:
        Map containing the name and the document.

      • getAnnotations

        public Map<String,ContainerAnnotation> getAnnotations()
        Provides access to all ContainerAnnotation contained by the structure.
        Returns:
        Map containing path and annotation where path is used for container management.

      • getContainerSignature

        public ContainerSignature getContainerSignature()
        Provides access to the ContainerSignature which signs the structure and its content.

      • attachDetachedDocument

        public boolean attachDetachedDocument(String path,
                                      InputStream data)
        Attached data to a detached ContainerDocument. Returns true after successful attachment.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the ContainerDocument to attach the data to.
        data - Data stream to be attached to the ContainerDocument. NB! Does NOT close the stream!

      • detachDocument

        public ContainerDocument detachDocument(String path)
                                 throws ParsingStoreException
        Returns existing ContainerDocument if present and replaces it with an EmptyContainerDocument in the SignatureContent. If no document found or if the document is already detached null will be returned.
        Throws:
        ParsingStoreException - When detaching an instance of ParsedContainerDocument fails.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        Exception
